segments.text: I am great ! How about you , Mary ? How are you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am doing great ! Thank you for asking , Joe .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I was wondering if you want to go see a movie with me tonight ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I need to stay home tonight and finish my term paper .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . What about going to the movies on Friday night ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: What were you planning on seeing ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I was thinking about seeing that one about the rapist serial killer .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How about “ The Secret Life of Bees ” ?
segments.speaker: S1
